15DB27EA4FDA0251CB7F5DB8FE9994E3: Adjust the volume of Patchwork audio input before sending it to another Patchwork audio device. When you have a mix with multiple audio inputs, applying Gain to some of them can help balance the volume of each input in the overall mix.
EBE12DCE4FC5BFE59827F9988983FC11: Adjust the volume of Patchwork audio input before sending it to another Patchwork audio device. When you have a mix with multiple audio inputs, applying Gain to some of them can help balance the volume of each input in the overall mix.
43690F0542ED4B273A4C72B2627C2936: Multiplies the volume of the audio input by the selected value. A value of 0 will mute the audio. A value of 2 will double the volume of the audio.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.AllowPortSelection.D: Determines if the Patchwork Tool can access any cable input or output ports on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.EnabledOnPhase.Descr: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-game includes all phases prior to start of game (like the pre-game lobby or countdown to start of game.) This setting does not affect Edit Mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.Disable.Description: Disables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.Enable.Description: Enables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.LegalInfo.Descriptio: Please note: Use of a Patchwork audio device is limited to the creation of new and original musical works.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.AudioOut.Description: Sets the destination for this device's Audio Out cable.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.AudioIn.Description: Sets the inputs for this device's Audio In port.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.GainIn.Description: Sets the inputs for this device's Gain knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.OnDisabled.Descripti: Triggers an event when the device is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricGain_C.OnEnabled.Descriptio: Triggers an event when the device is enabled.
